lead_paragraph: Leland Yee, an ex-state senator, pleaded guilty Wednesday to a racketeering charge in an organized crime and public corruption case centered in San Francisco’s Chinatown.

headline.main: California: Ex-Senator Pleads Guilty in Racketeering and Corruption Case
headline.print_headline: California: Ex-Senator Pleads Guilty In Racketeering and Corruption Case

snippet: Leland Yee, an ex-state senator, pleaded guilty Wednesday to a racketeering charge in an organized crime and public corruption case centered in San Francisco’s Chinatown.
